DOC.HEADLINE: STUDENT FILM , VIDEO PROGRAMS SCHEDULED
DOC.TEXT: The American Cinematheque , in collaboration with the University Film and Video Assn. , presents the best of the second annual UFVA Student Film & Video Festival in two different 92-minute programs at 7 p.m. and 9 p.m. Saturday in the Chaplin Theater , Raleigh Studios , 5300 Melrose Ave . ( between Bronson and Van Ness avenues ) . Short film and video work in all genres will be presented , many with their makers present.The festival premiered in Bozeman , Mont. , at the University Film and Video Assn. ; Los Angeles is the third stop in the program ' s North_American tour . The association , which includes teachers , students and others interested in the development of film as a means of communication , was founded in 1947 . Information : ( 213 ) 466-FILM , Ext . 2 .
